A Psalm <FI>or<Fi> Song for the sons of Korah. His foundation <FI>is<Fi> in the holy mountains.<RF>for the sons: or, of the sons<Rf>
The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.<CM>
I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this <FI>man<Fi> was born there.
And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, <FI>that<Fi> this <FI>man<Fi> was born there. Selah.
As well the singers as the players on instruments <FI>shall be there<Fi>: all my springs <FI>are<Fi> in thee.<CM>
